channel.title: Game Story
channel.description: So me and a few other people are going to be making our own MMORPG. We need some ideas on our story line. It's going to be during the Medieval period, so around the 5th-15th century. Now during this time, the catholic churches were very corrupt, so that's something I'm taking to mind to maybe put into the story line.

item.title: Game Story
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

So me and a few other people are going to be making our own MMORPG. We need some ideas on our story line. It’s going to be during the Medieval period, so around the 5th-15th century. Now during this time, the catholic churches were very corrupt, so that’s something I’m taking to mind to maybe put into the story line.

Read full topic
